data.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike
data.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
data.effects: Summons red lightning that spreads from impact

data.name: Aspects Of The Crucible: Horns
data.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
data.effects: creates shoulder horn to gore foes from a low stance.

data.name: Agheel's Flame
data.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of the flying dragon Agheel.
data.effects: Spews flame breath of Agheel from above

data.name: Aspects Of The Crucible: Tail
data.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
data.effects: Creates supple tail to sweep area before caster

data.name: Barrier Of Gold
data.description: One of the incantations of Erdtree Worship.
data.effects: Greatly increases magic damage negation for self & allies

data.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
data.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
data.effects: Stabs with red lightning spear from above

data.name: Beast Claw
data.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
data.effects: Creates claws that tear through the land.

data.name: Aspect Of The Crucible: Breath
data.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
data.effects: Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking

data.name: Bestial Constitution
data.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
data.effects: Alleviates blood loss and frost buildup

data.name: Bestial Sling
data.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman. Swiftly flings a number of sharp rock shards. This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action. It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.
data.effects: Swiftly flings numerous sharp rock shards
